scripts.init: npm install -D shx && npm run clean && npm install && npm run initInstall
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf build node_modules package-lock.json gui/node_modules gui/package-lock.json
scripts.initInstall:windows: npm install --prefix .\gui && pip install -r .\pyapp\requirements.txt && pip install cefpython3
scripts.pre: shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && run-script-os
scripts.pre:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-pre-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-pre-cef .\buildCEF\windows-pre-cef
scripts.pre:folder: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-pre.spec
scripts.pre:folder:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-pre-cef.spec && shx mv .\build\windows-folder-pre-cef .\buildCEF\windows-folder-pre-cef
scripts.build: shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && run-script-os
scripts.build:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-cef.spec && shx mv . uild\windows-cef . uildCEF\windows-cef
scripts.build:folder: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf build && npm run build --prefix ./gui && pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder.spec
scripts.build:folder:cef: python pyapp\spec\getSpec.py && shx rm -rf buildCEF && npm run build --prefix ./gui && pyinstaller --clean .\pyapp\spec\windows-folder-cef.spec && shx mv . uild\windows-folder-cef . uildCEF\windows-folder-cef
scripts.alembic:macos: && alembic upgrade head && alembic upgrade head --sql > ../../static/db/migration.sql && alembic current > ../../static/db/version
scripts.alembic:windows: && alembic.exe upgrade head && alembic.exe upgrade head --sql > ..\..\static\db\migration.sql && alembic.exe current > ..\..\static\db\version
